docs.abstract: Mercy College in Dobbs Ferry, NY, is offering training program for Oriental medicine and acupuncture; photos (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: HERBERT LAU is a man of science who left mainland China for the United States to earn his doctorate in analytical chemistry. For the last 20 years, he has worked in medical laboratories, most recently as the chemical director at the Corning Met-Path Laboratory in Buffalo. But last month, Dr. Lau left his home in Buffalo for a small dormitory room on the campus of Mercy College here. He is enrolled in the college's first training program for Oriental medicine and acupuncture, an ancient practice, which holds that diseases and injuries can be treated by using tiny needles to stimulate the flow of energy along pathways in the body called meridians.
docs.snippet: HERBERT LAU is a man of science who left mainland China for the United States to earn his doctorate in analytical chemistry. For the last 20 years, he has worked in medical laboratories, most recently as the chemical director at the Corning Met-Path...

docs.abstract: Roche Laboratories names Lowe & Partners/SMS, Lowe Direct and Lowe McAdams Health Care to introduce Xenical, anti-obesity drug; Merck & Co names Young & Rubicam Inc to introduce Propecia, hair restorative product (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: Two drug companies have named agencies for products awaiting approval. Roche Laboratories in Nutley, N.J., named Lowe & Partners/SMS and its sibling agencies, Lowe Direct and Lowe McAdams Health Care, to introduce Xenical, an anti-obesity drug. Billings were estimated to be as much as $50 million. The agencies, all in New York and all part of the Lowe Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies, were awarded the account after a review that included five undisclosed agencies.
docs.snippet: Two drug companies have named agencies for products awaiting approval.    Roche Laboratories in Nutley, N.J., named Lowe & Partners/SMS and its sibling agencies, Lowe Direct and Lowe McAdams Health Care, to introduce Xenical, an anti-obesity drug....
